title: Final Session Complete - Next Priorities
content: Final comprehensive testing session complete. Phases 1-2 done with 32 tests (BroadcastManager 13, SyncCoordinator 19). All 1846 tests passing. Full MCP arsenal used: Context7 for WebExtensions API validation, Perplexity for expert testing strategy (identified 5 priorities), Agentic-Tools for memory persistence (4 memories total). Next priorities per Perplexity: 1) Network resilience (offline/reconnect), 2) Lifecycle events (tab closure, browser restart), 3) Visual regression, 4) Concurrency, 5) Firefox-specific APIs. Infrastructure proven, patterns established, documentation complete. Ready for Phase 3 implementation with clear expert-validated roadmap.
